BugInstance.message: org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.database.oracle.connector.OracleConnectionPropertiesParser.getStandardConnectionProperties(String, Matcher): 2nd parameter 'matcher' could be declared as java.util.regex.MatchResult instead

org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.database.oracle.connector.OracleConnectionPropertiesParser.getThinConnectionProperties(String, Matcher): 2nd parameter 'matcher' could be declared as java.util.regex.MatchResult instead
This use of java/sql/Connection.prepareStatement(Ljava/lang/String;)Ljava/sql/PreparedStatement; can be vulnerable to SQL injection (with JDBC)
